description:
What is this Course About?

This course will teach you: How to Film, Edit and Produce High Quality Webcam Videos, with good lighting, image and sound.

Examples of Ideal Students

  • Youtubers
  • Online Instructors
  • Video Bloggers

Benefits for You

  • Be able to Film and Produce Great Webcam Videos
  • Create a Setup to Make More Videos Fast and Easy
  • Stand out with Your Professional Quality

Examples of Use Cases

  • Video Blogs and Discussions
  • Instructional and Teaching Videos
  • PiP Videos for Screen Recordings
  • Video Calls on Skype, Hangouts etc.

Course Overview

The Course starts with the foundations, showing real practical examples of bad and good webcam videos, and explains the reasons why they are bad/good.

Then we will go through step by step what you need to know and take action on to be able to film, edit and produce webcam videos with high quality image, lighting and sound.
You will finish the course by completing a course project, which means you will Film, Edit and Publish a short Webcam Video using the knowledge you gained in this course.

What is in this Course?

  • 6 years of video production experience condensed into a ~ 1 hour video course
  • Step by step instructions for filming and producing high quality webcam videos
  • A dynamic and personal style of teaching
  • Mixed formats to create more interest for you
title: Webcam Video Production for Beginners
